narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: Medical Express Depot Inc. is a Durable Medical Equipment & Medical Supplies provider based in Pittsburgh, PA. From the 2018–2024 period, this provider received $49.7M in Medicaid payments across 219K claims serving 0 beneficiaries.

narrative.title: Why This Matters
narrative.text: At $49.7M in Medicaid payments, this provider represents significant public healthcare spending. Understanding where these dollars go helps ensure the program serves those who need it most.
